title: Looking for people to play with
body: Looking for people to play with, ranked team or not. Prefer to adc even though it's not my best role.

replies.body:
Heyo!  If you're interested in a game once a week, Riot BaconHawk does a kind of "first come, first serve" custom ARAM on Tuesdays! :)  

Keep your eyes open for posts like http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/WJuzPMgF-tuesday-teamfight.  I don't think there will be one next week because of Thanksgiving absences, but take a look on a weekly basis.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Codebear,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=WnHlbmiH,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-20T00:28:02.725+0000)
>
> Heyo!  If you're interested in a game once a week, Riot BaconHawk does a kind of "first come, first serve" custom ARAM on Tuesdays! :)  
> 
> Keep your eyes open for posts like http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/WJuzPMgF-tuesday-teamfight.  I don't think there will be one next week because of Thanksgiving absences, but take a look on a weekly basis.

Can you ask her to host Dominion matches as well?

> [{quoted}](name=rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=WnHlbmiH,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-11-20T00:52:20.705+0000)
>
> Can you ask her to host Dominion matches as well?

A rotating game mode would be pretty cool, wouldn't it!  I'll see what she thinks :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Codebear,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=WnHlbmiH,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-11-20T23:58:23.547+0000)
>
> A rotating game mode would be pretty cool, wouldn't it!  I'll see what she thinks :)

Thanks! :D
